titleStmt.title: A briefe declaration to all the vvorld from the innocent people of God called Quakers of our principle and beleif [sic] concerning plottings and fightings with carnal weapons against any people, men or nations upon the earth ... and to answer that common objection whether we would not fight if the Spirit moved us.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

titleStmt.title: A briefe declaration to all the vvorld from the innocent people of God called Quakers of our principle and beleif [sic] concerning plottings and fightings with carnal weapons against any people, men or nations upon the earth ... and to answer that common objection whether we would not fight if the Spirit moved us.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by NUC pre-1956 imprints and Wing to Bayly.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
